channel.title: Help with Java error?
channel.description:
Okay, So I've been running my server on all day, and I just downloaded this new source, and I Open run server and it gives me this error "Exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffoundError:Server And it says all this thread stuff blahblahblah
Could not find the main class: server program will now exit Ping request could not find host 127.0.0.1:43594 Please check the name and try again.
Okay can you guys help me? Oh and I cant run my older source it says the same thing

item.title: Help with Java error?
item.dc:creator: @thisserverrocks thisserverrocks
item.description:
@thisserverrocks wrote:

Okay, So I’ve been running my server on all day, and I just downloaded this new source, and I Open run server and it gives me this error "Exception in thread “main” java.lang.noclassdeffoundError:Server
And it says all this thread stuff blahblahblah

Could not find the main class: server program will now exit
Ping request could not find host 127.0.0.1:43594 Please check the name and try again.

Okay can you guys help me?
Oh and I cant run my older source it says the same thing

Read full topic
